reviewText: This has 2 hallween episodes not all Halloween episodes are here like the scary stories of littlest PET shop is not on here  the episode s are to Halloween like episodes are *door-jammed *right arms to hold you then 3 not really hallween episodes I think are bonus episodes  * pawlm reading *war of the weirds * the very little pet shop I give a 8 out 10 I think good if like some episodes of show but there not a lot of hallween episodes on it
Have not watched this yet, but it is part of a themed package for my granddaughter who loves Littlest Pet Shop figures. This will be a great little addition to the other gifts she will receive.

I bought this for my 9 year old boy and girl. It is episodes and not a movie which I didn't realize when I bought it. They love lps but have never had any interest in watching movies only youtube videos
Not a Halloween Movie: just a few episodes that are kind of "scary."  My daughter had already seen the episodes and was very disappointed it wasn't new.

Another great DVD with some great episodes included. My daughters favorites were War of the Weirds and Pawlm Reading, but all were wonderfully made and a ton of fun to watch as a family. You get great characters and a fun story in each episode. If you have never watched this series before, it is fun for all ages, so give it a try!

Episodes Included:

Door-Jammed
Eight Arms To Hold You
Pawlm Reading
War of the Weirds
The Very Littlest Pet Shop

*I received this for review - all opinions are my own*

Once again Google has helped me in finding out the episodes of this dvd so that I can share them with you:
1) Door-jammed (season 1)
2) Eight arms to hold you (season 2)
3) Pawlm reading (season 2)
4) War of the weirds (season 3)
5) The very littlest pet shop (season 3)

My kids love this series! This was another great collection of episodes and I quickly came to find that the girls were asking me to watch this over and over again. As a patent I have to say that I love watching this because the episodes have some great messages about friendship, teamwork and so much more. The episodes were fun and definitely kept everyone happy in the end! If you have never seen this series in the past I would highly recommend this DVD to all!

*I received this for review - all opinions are my own*

The 5 episodes on this LPS dvd are as follows:
1. Books & Covers (season 1)
2. Helicopter Dad (season 1)
3. Lotsa Luck (season 1)
4. The Nest Hat Craze (season 2)
5. Sweet Pepper (season 2 & my personal favorite episode)
